name: Super Shoot: Red Hot Pro
description:
Great game about incredibles who can make time slow
Super shoot: red hot is a arcade game about daredevil swat that defends citizens from terrorists with time control ability. When you move the time goes faster when you stay still it goes slower. You are like rambo in world of time and shooting
Features:
1. Awesome gameplay
2. You so cool in that game, like rambo, you know
3. Super cool mechanic.
4. Hot graphics.
5. Hardcore arcade style of gameplay.

Download super shoot: red hot right now and do not forget to leave a comment.
